articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Man held on rape charge flees Oklahoma jail
articles.description: OKMULGEE, Okla. (AP) — A 20-year-old man held on a rape charge is being sought after authorities say he escaped from an east central Oklahoma county jail. Okmulgee County officials say Cayman Coleman has been unaccounted for since Friday morning. Surveillance…

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Escapee from east central Oklahoma county jail recaptured
articles.description: OKMULGEE, Okla. (AP) — An escapee from an east central Oklahoma county jail who was being held on rape and larceny charges has been recaptured after a weekend on the run. The Okmulgee County Sheriff’s Office on Monday announced Cayman Coleman has been caught.…

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/kfor4
articles.title: Search continues for "dangerous" man who escaped from jail
articles.description:
OKMULGEE, Okla. - Officials are still searching for a man who they consider to be dangerous after he escaped from jail.

Around 7 a.m. Friday, Okmulgee County officials said Cayman Coleman was unaccounted for.

articles.title: Escapee from east central Oklahoma county jail recaptured
articles.description: OKMULGEE, Okla. (AP) — An escapee from an east central Oklahoma county jail who was being held on rape and larceny charges has been recaptured after a weekend on the run.

articles.title: Man 'beat girlfriend's son for unwrapping Christmas gift'
articles.description: Wesley McCollum, 22, was arrested on Saturday night in Okmulgee after his girlfriend Bridgette Payne called police.

articles.author: By Harrison Grimwood Tulsa World
articles.title: Man accused of making threats against state senator in Okmulgee
articles.description: Okmulgee County Sheriff's deputies allege a man came to the sheriff's office to ask about security for a town forum where a state senator was speaking and made threats toward the senator while talking to deputies.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Police say woman dead, cousin arrested in Oklahoma slaying
articles.description: WINCHESTER, Okla. (AP) — Authorities in eastern Oklahoma say a woman is dead and her cousin is in custody in eastern Oklahoma. A news release from the Okmulgee County Sheriff’s office says the woman was found dead Tuesday night in a home in Winchester. The re…

articles.description: Okmulgee County Sheriff's deputies allege a man came to the sheriff's office to ask about security for a town forum where a state senator was speaking and made threats toward the senator while talking to deputies.

articles.title: Man 'beat his girlfriend's five-year-old son around the face after he opened one of his Christmas gifts early'

articles.author: By Kevin Canfield Tulsa World
articles.title: First week of operations at new Tulsa jail goes smoothly, city officials say
articles.description: Approximately 18 inmates a night stayed in the municipal Tulsa jail during its first week of operation. Officials say they are pleased with how the new facility is running.

articles.title: A Twitter Bot Is Posting the Names and Locations of Immigrant Detention Centers Across the U.S.
articles.description: A Twitter bot is posting images and information about all 212 prisons and detention centers that hold immigrants across the United States, providing a systematic overview of where people are being detained in the wake of increased scrutiny on the nation’s “ze…

articles.title: ‘Super secret sugar daddy’ groomed ‘staggering’ number of teen victims, Okla. deputies say
